projects.title: Ganjoorjoor
projects.description: A pioneering semantic search engine for classic Persian poetry. It empowers users to discover poems based on their conceptual meaning, bridging a thousand years of rich literary history.
projects.intuition: I have a deep love for Persian literature, but often struggled to recall specific verses. I envisioned a search engine that could find poetry based on the meaning behind the words, not just exact keywords, making this vast literary tradition more accessible to everyone.
roadmap: Download all poems from major poets
Generate embeddings for each verse and its meaning
Develop and deploy the public website

projects.title: Termustat
projects.description: An online tool that helps university students schedule their academic semesters. Since its launch in 2018, Termustat has efficiently served over 2,000 students across three public universities in Iran.
projects.intuition: During my second year of undergrad, course planning was a frustrating manual task. We had to sift through a large PDF of courses to build a conflict-free schedule by hand. I wanted to create a tool to automate this tedious process entirely.
roadmap: Create the online scheduling table interface
